{"body": {"name": "Owen DevRel Contributor Report 9 September - 22 September 2024", "summary": "Bi-weekly paid developer relations contributor report. These activities aim to improve the developer experience in the NEAR ecosystem. ", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "gagdiez.near", "description": "## Timeline\\\\nStart Date: September 9, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd Date: September 22, 2024\\\\n\\\\u{200b}\\\\n## Requested Funding\\\\nHours: 39:35 \\\\n\\\\nRate: $50/hour \\\\n\\\\nTotal Amount: $1979 \\\\n\\\\n# Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n### Developer and community support \\\\n- 9:00 Supporting developers through Discord, Telegram and office hours\\\\n\\\\n### Contributions\\\\n- 13:20 Completing auction tutorial (completing indexing, fixing factory and finishing docs). [Docs](https://github.com/near/docs), [Repo](https://github.com/near-examples/auctions-tutorial/tree/main)\\\\n\\\\n### Content \\\\n- 9:30 Aggregating, writing and pushing out the dev Newsletter for two weeks\\\\n- 2:30 [near-multichain video production](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=seA32rvko1c)\\\\n- 0:20 Testing create near app\\\\n- 0:40 Testing and [fixing near-multichain](https://github.com/near-examples/near-multichain/commit/578ad9ad53d2e3898db1fe45953647ab740ca084)\\\\n- 0:30 Assisting with AI builder call \\\\n\\\\n#### General / Other \\\\n- 1:45 DevRel team calls\\\\n- 0:40 Setting up moderation bots in Telegram channels\\\\n- 0:30 One-on-one with manager Guillermo\\\\n- 0:50 Misc activities, little odd jobs like reading updates and messaging with team\\\\n\\\\nNote that during this period I also supported at ETH Singapore which will be billed separately to the events committee.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "icespice.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1979", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 129782591}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 09/09/2024 - 10/06/2024", "summary": "Worked on integrating new features to treasury dashboard, like asset exchange using the ref-sdk API, stake delegation, made first version live for devhub, fixed some bugs with devhub and other instances.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "### Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n#### Week 1 (9 Sept to 15 Sept)\\\\n\\\\n- Add new create exchange UI page (as per Vova\\\\u{2019}s redesign), add endpoints to backend to get smart swap using multiple pools, integrate backend APIs with frontend to create multiple proposals for swap, show current slippage to restrict vote, figure out way to club the same swap proposals (near to any other FT token) together for vote, add history page with settings dropdown, figure out issue with \\\\u{2018}digit\\\\u{2019} error with add_proposal [#54](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/54) [#1](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/ref-sdk-api/pull/1) (4.7d) \\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix linked RFP on proposal feed page [#934](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/934) (0.5h) \\\\n\\\\nTotal: 40 hours\\\\n\\\\n#### Week 2 (16 Sept to 22 Sept)\\\\n\\\\n- Discuss with Peter about better solutions for multiple txn call in one proposal, share the possible solutions with Vlad (0.5h)\\\\n- Look for ways to improve the performance of the backend API, add smartPath API of ref finance, change from nearblocks and fastnear to pikespeak API for user balances, add endpoints for (un)wrap NEAR [#2](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/ref-sdk-api/pull/2) (1.5d)\\\\n- Call with Peter regarding laggy widgets input (1h) \\\\n- Call with Ori (20 mins)\\\\n- Call with Vova (20 mins)\\\\n- Call with Ori and Vova (20 mins)\\\\n- Look for API to get account balances of FT and near on certain timestamp for chart, discuss with Peter and Vlad, start working on API for balance chart on dashboard screen (5h)\\\\n- Fix RFP timeline issue [#935](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/935) (0.5h)\\\\n- Reply to Trentin queries (1h)\\\\n- Fix the tests with the markdown viewer, test it on near dev and fix minor CSS, add image upload to editor [#931](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/931) (2d)\\\\n- Update the asset exchange create request to include warnings for NEAR to FT swap, loader skeleton [#54](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/54) (4h) \\\\n\\\\nTotal: 41 hours\\\\n\\\\n#### Week 3 (23 Sept to 29 Sept)\\\\n\\\\n- Call with Peter to discuss about failing tests and adding new ones (1h)\\\\n- Add test to check the linked RFP by mocking RPC data [#934](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/934) (2h)\\\\n- Work on new updates swap of near <> wNear and FT contract register call by creator [#54](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/54) (5h)\\\\n- Add the UI design for balance chart on dashboard [#58](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/58) (1d)\\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix add RFP and clean draft state after RFP is submitted [#940](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/940) (1h) \\\\n- Create new issues regarding tests and instance management [#939](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/939) [#937](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/937) (0.5h) \\\\n- Add table css to markdown viewer [#941](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/941) (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Trentin (10 mins)\\\\n- Make all screens mobile responsive [#57](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/57) (1h)\\\\n- Match iframe text style to that of outside frame[ #943](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/943) (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix the labels issue with linking RFP for proposal and add tests [#947](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/947)  (3h) \\\\n- Help Tanya with wallet issues (1h)\\\\n- Work on create stake and unstake request [#60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) (2d) \\\\n- Convert USD to near tokens for near requested token, add tests for near and stable transfers [#61](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/61) (4h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 45 hours\\\\n\\\\n#### Week 4 (30 Sept to 6 Oct)\\\\n\\\\n- Add pending and history pages for stake delegation, redirect to history when proposal is voted on. [#60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) (2d) \\\\n- Update dashboard to include locked NEAR tokens and for available balance reduce the staked near, display stake txn in transactions history [#60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) (3h)\\\\n- Remove the markdown iframe and import the css, add tests to view links and mention account in viewer [#949](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/949) (1d)\\\\n- Setup new instance for infinex, create dao and widget account, hide few items from UI, change theme, discuss with Vova about dark theme design, chat with Peter for tests  [#59](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/59) (1d)\\\\n- Call with Peter about tests issue (0.5h)\\\\n- Discuss with Vova about time gap between unstake and withdraw, how to display in UI (0.5h)\\\\n- Look at the design for dark theme, start work on it. (4h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 40 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal Hours: 166\\\\nHourly rate: $50/h\\\\nTotal: 8300 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "megha19.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8300", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "OTHER"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 129791344}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @megha19.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 09/09/2024 - 10/06/2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWorked on integrating new features to treasury dashboard, like asset exchange using the ref-sdk API, stake delegation, made first version live for devhub, fixed some bugs with devhub and other instances.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=220)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"widget": {"devhub.entity.proposal.Editor": {"": "const { href } = VM.require(\\\\\\\"devhub.near/widget/core.lib.url\\\\\\\");\\\\nconst draftKey = \\\\\\\"PROPOSAL_EDIT\\\\\\\";\\\\nhref || (href = () => {});\\\\nconst { getLinkUsingCurrentGateway } = VM.require(\\\\n \\\\\\\"devhub.near/widget/core.lib.url\\\\\\\"\\\\n) || {
